sqlMap.select: SELECT count(*) FROM board WHERE board_chk = #board_chk#

SELECT B.* FROM( SELECT A.*, rownum as rnum FROM( SELECT row_number()over(ORDER BY seq ASC) as rown, seq, board_chk,title,content,readcount,rp_seq,filename, to_char(write_date , 'YYYY-MM-DD') as write_date,brc_id, (SELECT count(*) AS rp_cnt FROM board rp WHERE exists(SELECT * FROM board WHERE rp.rp_seq=bd.seq)) AS rp_cnt FROM board bd WHERE board_chk = #board_chk# AND rp_seq = 0
AND title like '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
AND content like '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
AND brc_id like '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY rown DESC )A )B
WHERE #startNum# < rnum AND rnum < #endNum#
